attributes.action: Ban credit card companies from adveretising using the following T.V , Newspapers and advertising boards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that Credit card companies should not be allowed to advertise on T.V , In newspapers and on Advertising boards. There are enough problems in the world and this is one that so many people end up in DEBT. The goverment should Ban the adveretising so there is less temptation for people to amass a huge ammount of DEBT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
